name: medom
description: Just a wrapper of HTML elements

scripts.release:before: npm run-script test && npm run-script doc && echo git commit -a -m DOC
scripts.release:major: npm run-script release:before && webpack --env.major && npm run-script release:publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run-script release:before && webpack --env.minor && npm run-script release:publish
scripts.release:patch: npm run-script release:before && webpack --env.patch && npm run-script release:publish
scripts.release:publish: echo git commit -a -m BUILD && version-to-tag.sh && npm publish

author: Fabio Ricali
